MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG8 postcode area of Newtown Stewart. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:32am. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:52am on 7th January
